posts.post_title: FS: T206 HOF Clark Griffith Polar Bear SGC
posts.post_content:
Hi, I have a T206 SGC 10 Clark Griffith Polar Bear Back for sale. There is a small number 31 written in pencil on the top boarder. I would like $32.00 that includes shipping for the card, I would like payment to be a paypal gift to [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url]. Thanks

Joe
